questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A group of people
B) A sculpture of a cow and the moon
C) A building
D) A body of water

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A sculpture of a cow jumping over the moon
C) A person
D) A car

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) Trees with lights
C) A river
D) A cityscape

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A A red sculpture of a cow lying down
B) A bench
C) A lake
D) A playground

What is the relationship between the sculpture and the background elements?
A) The sculpture is in a natural setting with trees and lights
B) The sculpture is in a crowded city street
C) The sculpture is in a desert
D) The sculpture is in a busy market

What kind of lighting is used in the photo?
A) Natural sunlight
B) Fluorescent lighting
C) Decorative and festive lighting
D) Candlelight

A) Blue
B) Green
C) Red
D) Yellow

A) Standing still
B) Jumping over the moon
C) Lying down
D) Running

A) Blue
B) Green
C) Yellow
D) Red

A) By natural light

D) By a spotlight

A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What is the relationship between the cow and the moon in the sculpture?
A) They are standing side by side
B) The cow is jumping over the moon
C) The moon is on top of the cow
D) The cow is chasing the moon

What is the likely purpose of the photo?
A) To document a daily routine
B) To showcase an art installation
C) To capture a sports moment
D) To feature a building

How is the cow positioned in the sculpture?
A) Lying on the ground
B) Standing upright
C) Mid-jump over the moon

A) Streetlights
B) Decorative lights
C) Flashlights

A) Buildings

D) Animals

A) It represents a famous historical event

C) It depicts a realistic scene

A) To highlight the sculpture and create a festive atmosphere

What is the color of the cow?
A) Blue
